t: Mochidoki - Products, Competitors, Financials, Employees, Headquarters Locations
s: Mochidoki specializes in mochi ice cream and operates within the frozen dessert sector. The company offers a range of mochi ice cream products made from various ingredients, wrapped in mochi rice cake. It primarily sells to the gourmet food industry, direct consumers, and food service businesses.

t: Founded in 2015, Mochidoki is a nationally renowned, New York-based mochi ice cream company beloved for imaginative and refined Japanese-inspired desserts. Using only the highest-quality ingredients, Mochidoki offers elegant flavors in premium packaging. Whether picking up a box at your local supermarket, ordering online, stopping into one of our shops, or indulging in dessert at a favorite restaurant, we are committed to delivering the best and most innovative mochi experience.

t: Mochidoki - Overview, News & Similar companies | ZoomInfo.com
s: Mochidoki is a premium mochi ice cream company that specializes in creating uniquely indulgent treats by wrapping premium ice cream in a chewy mochi rice cake. They offer a variety of globally-inspired flavors and seasonal, chef-driven specials to cater to discerning palates.

t: Meet Mochidoki: Maker Of Modern Mochi Ice Creams
s: April 27, 2021 - Ken Gordon and Christopher Wong launched Mochidoki in 2015 as a wholesale brand serving the foodservice industry, with restaurant partners like Nobu, Wynn Resorts and Tao Group.
